about_the_game:
Become Heathmoor's demon hunter as Yokai Slayer Meiko, a full body customization for Kensei. With the Yokai running rampant throughout the Myre, Meiko takes up the dangerous relic known as the Mamono Dagger. In the hopes of saving her brother – and her entire village – she must risk becoming a Yokai herself.

The Hero Skin of Yokai Hunter Meiko offer includes:
- One Kensei Hero Skin
- Seven-Day Champion Status
- Three Scavenger Crates

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX950 / GTX1050 with 2 GB VRAM | AMD Radeon R9 270 / R9 370 / RX460 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and Keyboard supported. Game contains EasyAntiCheat anti-cheat technology and Denuvo anti-tamper technology.
